Installation
/C:/Users/HP/Documents/GitHub/BasicCAT-website/silhouette/docs.md
For Windows, unzip the file and use the <g1>Silhouette.exe</g1> to run the program.
对于Windows ，解压文件后使用<g1>Silhouette.exe</g1>运行程序。
For Windows, unzip the file and use the <g1>Silhouette.exe</g1> to run the program.
/C:/Users/HP/Documents/GitHub/BasicCAT-website/silhouette/docs.md
For macOS, drag the application in the dmg file into the <g1>Applications</g1> folder to install it.
对于macOS，将dmg文件中的应用拖动到<g1>Applications</g1>文件夹中以进行安装。
For macOS, drag the application in the dmg file into the <g1>Applications</g1> folder to install it.
/C:/Users/HP/Documents/GitHub/BasicCAT-website/silhouette/docs.md

Here is a basic process using Silhouette to translate a video/audio file:
以下是使用Silhouette翻译视频/音频文件的基本过程：
Here is a basic process using Silhouette to translate a video/audio file:
/C:/Users/HP/Documents/GitHub/BasicCAT-website/silhouette/docs.md
Use the file menu in the menu bar to open a media file and configure the language pair.
使用菜单栏中的文件菜单打开媒体文件并配置语言对。
Use the file menu in the menu bar to open a media file and configure the language pair.
/C:/Users/HP/Documents/GitHub/BasicCAT-website/silhouette/docs.md
Use the edit menu to recognize the speech, detect the voice activity and edit the lines.
使用编辑菜单识别语音、检测语音活动并编辑字幕行。
Use the edit menu to recognize the speech, detect the voice activity and edit the lines.
